modName: Serana Hood aka Carry Weight Bug Fix
summary: Serana adds another hood to her inventory every time she puts it on, eventually ending up with maxed out carry weight
descriptionHtml:
You know that bug where Serana\'s inventory is mysteriously empty but she can\'t carry anything else?  Well, it\'s because she is carrying a ****load of hoods.
The problem is really with the script which I cannot fix, but I can make the hood weightless.
This has not been fixed by the Unofficial Dawnguard Patch (yet) so if you have Serana as a follower for a long time; you probably will want this.
Just put the file in the skyrim Data folder and make sure it is enabled on the load order; that\'s it!
Requires Dawnguard DLC.
Compatible with everything that doesn\'t edit Serana\'s hood.
author: mrjentipede
